system.effect: The target's nose breaks in a torrent of blood, blinding him for 1 round. The target must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Head (Severity 3)

The target's nose breaks in a torrent of blood, blinding him for 1 round. The target must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round.
